trans-unit.source: Serves as the abstract base class for validation controls.
trans-unit.target: 作為驗證控制項的抽象基底類別。

trans-unit.source: The BaseValidator class provides the core implementation for all validation controls.
trans-unit.target: BaseValidator 類別提供之所有驗證控制項的核心實作。

trans-unit.source: Validation controls are used to validate user input in an associated input control.
trans-unit.target: 驗證控制項用來驗證相關聯的輸入控制項中的使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: When the user enters a value that fails validation, the validation control displays an error message.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者輸入驗證失敗的值時，驗證控制項就會顯示錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: Because a validation control is separated from the input control, you can position the error message anywhere on the page relative to the input control.
trans-unit.target: 因為驗證控制項分開的輸入控制項，您可以在相對於輸入控制項的頁面上任何位置放置錯誤訊息。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides several validation controls that perform specific types of validation.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供了數個可執行特定的驗證類型驗證控制項。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes these controls.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述這些控制項。

trans-unit.source: |Validation control|Description| |------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>|Validates a value against the value entered into another input control, against a constant value, or against a proper data type by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.Operator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator?displayProperty=fullName>.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>|Validates a value using a user-provided custom validation routine.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>|Validates whether a value is within a range of values.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator>|Validates a value using a regular expression.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>|Validates that a value was entered in a required field.| Validation controls always validate the associated input control on the server.
trans-unit.target: |驗證控制項 |描述 | |------------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>|會針對另一個輸入控制項中輸入的值與常數值，或針對適當的資料類型的值驗證<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.Operator%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性設定為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator?displayProperty=fullName>。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>|驗證使用的使用者提供自訂驗證常式值。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>|驗證值是否可為值的範圍內。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator>|驗證使用規則運算式的值。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>|驗證必要的欄位中所輸入的值。 | 驗證控制項一律會驗證伺服器上的相關聯輸入的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RegularExpressionValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationCompareOperator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator.Operator%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompareValidator>

trans-unit.source: Validation controls also have complete client-side implementation that allows script-enabled browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer version 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client.
trans-unit.target: 驗證控制項也會有完整的用戶端實作，可讓指令碼啟用 （例如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 或更新版本) 的瀏覽器用戶端上執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端驗證，以增強驗證程序傳送到伺服器之前，請檢查使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓之前提交表單時，避免的伺服器端驗證所需的資訊，來回行程期間偵測到用戶端上的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: Multiple validation controls can be used with an individual input control to validate different criteria.
trans-unit.target: 多個驗證控制項可以搭配個別的輸入控制項，以驗證不同的準則。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can apply multiple validation controls on a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以套用多個驗證控制項上<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: You can use a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator> control to ensure that the value entered in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control is within a set range, and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control to ensure that the user enters a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>控制項中輸入的值時，確保<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>內設定的範圍和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>控制項，以確保使用者輸入的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RangeValidator>

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供許多控制項已張貼至伺服器的能力。

trans-unit.source: When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 當其中一種控制項具有其`CausesValidation`屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> > [!NOTE] > Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列控制項有能力回傳至伺服器:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName>> [!NOTE] > 類控制項回傳至伺服器時，才`AutoPostBack`屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 這些控制項都具有`ValidationGroup`屬性，設定時，控制觸發程序回傳至伺服器時，驗證只驗證控制項內指定的群組。

trans-unit.source: To group validation controls, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ValidationGroup%2A> property of each validation control to the same value.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證控制項組成群組，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ValidationGroup%2A>每個驗證控制項屬性設為相同值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: To associate an input control with a validation control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要將輸入的控制項與驗證控制項產生關聯，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要驗證失敗時，驗證控制項中顯示的文字，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以顯示在頁面中的驗證失敗所使用的所有控制項的摘要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text to display in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要顯示在文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控制，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property without setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> property, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property is also displayed in the validation control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>屬性未設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>屬性、 值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>屬性也會顯示在驗證控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: When using validator controls, you should always check the results of server-side validation before performing any processing.
trans-unit.target: 當使用驗證器控制項時，您應該永遠會檢查之前執行任何處理伺服器端驗證的結果。

trans-unit.source: After a postback but before your event methods are called, the page calls the validator controls and aggregates their results into the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 回傳，但之後會呼叫事件方法之前，頁面呼叫驗證程式控制項和彙總至其結果<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: (You can also call the validator controls explicitly using the `Validate` method.) In your own code, you should check that the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property returns `true` before processing input.
trans-unit.target: (您也可以呼叫使用明確的驗證程式控制項`Validate`方法。)在您自己的程式碼中，您應該檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性會傳回`true`之前處理輸入。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Even though script-enabled browsers might prevent a postback from occurring on the client if a validation check has failed, you should always also check <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> in server code before processing validated data.
trans-unit.target: 即使已啟用指令碼的瀏覽器可能會阻止回傳發生在用戶端上，如果驗證檢查失敗，您永遠也應該檢查<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>處理驗證的資料之前的伺服器程式碼中。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can also manually perform validation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以手動執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: To validate all validation controls on the page, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證所有驗證控制項在頁面上，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Individual validation controls can be validated by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A> method of the control.
trans-unit.target: 可由使用驗證個別驗證控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>控制項的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you use the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property in a `Page_Load` method, you must first explicitly call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`Page_Load`方法，您必須先明確地呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Because validation occurs after the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName> event for the page, but before the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` events, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is not updated until the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 因為驗證發生之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName>事件頁面上，但會在事件處理常式之前`Click`或`Command`事件，<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性不會更新直到<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can place your code in the event handler for the `Click` or `Command` event instead of the `Page_Load` method.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以在您的程式碼的事件處理常式`Click`或`Command`事件，而不是`Page_Load`方法。

trans-unit.source: Not all Web server controls support validation controls.
trans-unit.target: 並非所有的 Web 伺服器控制項支援驗證的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The standard controls that can be validated with a validation control are: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName> > [!NOTE] > For an input control to be validated, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> attribute must be applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 標準控制項可驗證與驗證控制項有:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName>> [!NOTE] > 進行驗證，輸入控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>屬性必須套用至控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you use validator controls that derive from BaseValidator inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 當您使用驗證器控制項衍生自內 BaseValidator<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制，請確定驗證程式控制項以及與其相關聯的控制項是在相同的面板。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用<xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>控制局部網頁更新，請參閱[局部網頁呈現概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: When validation fails, you can set the focus on the associated input control by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.SetFocusOnError%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 當驗證失敗時，您可以藉由設定相關聯輸入控制項上設定焦點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.SetFocusOnError%2A>屬性`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.SetFocusOnError%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of BaseValidator, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 如需 BaseValidator 的執行個體的初始屬性值的清單，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.%23ctor%2A>建構函式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有關如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合網頁可及性標準標記的協助工具的資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not called directly.
trans-unit.target: 不會直接呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Validation controls that inherit from this class can call this constructor from their own constructors to initialize the base properties.
trans-unit.target: 繼承自這個類別的驗證控制項可以從他們自己的建構函式來初始化基底屬性呼叫這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator>的執行個體的初始屬性值

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ForeColor%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A>|`true`| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A>|`false`|

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles that need to be rendered for the control to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTML 屬性和需要呈現為指定控制項的樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The AddAttributesToRender method is used to render the attributes of the control in the HTML tag for the control.
trans-unit.target: AddAttributesToRender 方法用來呈現控制項的 HTML 標記中控制項的屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is typically overridden by control developers in derived classes to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter> output stream for a control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法通常會覆寫由控制項開發人員在衍生類別中插入適當的屬性和樣式以<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>控制項的輸出資料流。</xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，代表要呈現 HTML 內容的用戶端上的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: This property is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援這個屬性。

trans-unit.target: 嘗試設定此屬性。

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties.
trans-unit.target: 確認是否指定的控制項在頁面上，並包含驗證屬性。

trans-unit.source: The CheckControlValidationProperty method is a helper method used primarily by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlPropertiesValid%2A> method to verify whether the specified control is on the page and contains validation properties.
trans-unit.target: CheckControlValidationProperty 方法是 helper 方法主要是供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlPropertiesValid%2A>方法，以驗證是否已指定的控制項在頁面上，包含驗證屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlPropertiesValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method does not return a value to report the result.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會傳回值來報告結果。

trans-unit.source: Instead, it throws an exception when verification fails.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，它會擲回例外狀況時驗證失敗。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The control to verify.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Additional text to describe the source of the exception, if an exception is thrown from using this method.
trans-unit.target: 描述例外狀況的來源，如果無法使用這個方法擲回例外狀況的其他文字。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the control specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*> property is a valid control.
trans-unit.target: 決定控制項是否已由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>屬性是有效的控制。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>

trans-unit.source: The ControlPropertiesValid method is a helper method used primarily by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A> property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property contains a valid input control.
trans-unit.target: ControlPropertiesValid 方法是 helper 方法主要是供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A>屬性來判斷是否<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>屬性包含有效的輸入的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.PropertiesValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be a valid input control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property must be set to some value and that value must be a control on the page that supports validation.
trans-unit.target: 若要是有效的輸入的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>屬性必須設為某個值，該值必須是支援驗證頁面上的控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>是有效的控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the input control to validate.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定要驗證的輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the ControlToValidate property to specify the input control to validate.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用的 ControlToValidate 屬性來指定要驗證的輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: This property must be set to the ID of an input control for all validation controls except the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator> control, which can be left blank.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性必須設定為以外的所有驗證控制項的輸入控制項的 ID<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>控制項，可以保留空白。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify a valid input control, an exception will be thrown when the page is rendered.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定有效的輸入的控制項，在呈現的頁面時將會擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The ID must refer to a control within the same container as the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 識別碼必須參考相同的容器做為驗證控制項中的控制項。

trans-unit.source: It must be in the same page or user control, or it must be in the same template of a templated control.
trans-unit.target: 它必須位於相同的頁面或使用者控制項，或它必須位於相同的樣板化控制項範本。

trans-unit.source: The standard controls that can be validated are: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName> > [!NOTE] > For an input control to be validated, the <xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> attribute must be applied to the control.
trans-unit.target: 可驗證的標準控制項有:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName>> [!NOTE] > 進行驗證，輸入控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName>屬性必須套用至控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.ValidationPropertyAttribute?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlTextArea?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlSelect?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputText?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputPassword?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputFile?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FileUpload?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: All validation controls, except the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator> control, will pass validation if the input control specified by the ControlToValidate property contains no text.
trans-unit.target: 所有驗證控制項，除了<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>控制項，將會通過驗證，如果 ControlToValidate 屬性所指定的輸入的控制項不包含文字。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RequiredFieldValidator>

trans-unit.source: If you are using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator> control, the client-side and server-side validation functions are not called either.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>控制、 用戶端和伺服器端驗證函式不會呼叫 。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CustomValidator>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The input control to validate.
trans-unit.target: 要驗證的輸入的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>, which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the validation control can perform client-side validation.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否驗證控制項可以執行用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: The DetermineRenderUplevel method is a helper function that is used primarily by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A> property to determine whether the client's browser supports client script.
trans-unit.target: DetermineRenderUplevel 方法是 helper 函式，主要供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A>屬性來判斷用戶端瀏覽器是否支援用戶端指令碼。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.RenderUplevel%2A>

trans-unit.source: For this property to return `true`, the following conditions must be true: - The browser has client script enabled.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性來傳回`true`，下列條件必須成立:-瀏覽器已啟用的用戶端指令碼。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase.W3CDomVersion%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> object that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is 1 or later.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase.W3CDomVersion%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase>物件儲存在<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是 1 或更新版本。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> </xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase.W3CDomVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.EcmaScriptVersion%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> object that is stored in the <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is 1.2 or later.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.EcmaScriptVersion%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase>物件儲存在<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性是 1.2 或更新版本。</xref:System.Web.HttpRequest.Browser%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.HttpBrowserCapabilitiesBase> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.HttpCapabilitiesBase.EcmaScriptVersion%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation control can perform client-side validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果驗證控制項可以執行用戶端驗證。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display behavior of the error message in a validation control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證控制項中的錯誤訊息的顯示行為。

trans-unit.source: Use the Display property to specify the display behavior of the error message in the validation control.
trans-unit.target: 顯示屬性可以用於在驗證控制項中指定的錯誤訊息的顯示行為。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different values that can be used.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可用的不同值。

trans-unit.source: |Display behavior|Description| |----------------------|-----------------| |`None`|The validation message is never displayed inline.| |`Static`|Space for the validation message is allocated in the page layout.| |`Dynamic`|Space for the validation message is dynamically added to the page if validation fails.| > [!NOTE] > The display behavior depends on whether client-side validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: |顯示行為 |描述 | |----------------------|-----------------| |`None`|驗證訊息永遠不會內嵌顯示。 | |`Static`|驗證訊息會以版面配置的空間。 | |`Dynamic`|空間驗證訊息都會以動態方式加入至頁面驗證失敗時。 | > [!NOTE] > 顯示行為取決於是否執行用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: If client-side validation is not active (because the browser does not support it or because it has been disabled by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName> page directive or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.EnableClientScript%2A> property), `ValidatorDisplay.Static` and `ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic` behave the same way: the error message takes up space only if it is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端驗證不在作用中 (因為瀏覽器不支援或已停用使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName>頁面指示詞或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.EnableClientScript%2A>屬性)，`ValidatorDisplay.Static`和`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`以相同方式運作︰ 錯誤訊息空間時才會顯示。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.EnableClientScript%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.ClientTarget%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The ability to dynamically allocate space for the message when it is not being displayed (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) only works with client-side validation.
trans-unit.target: 能夠動態配置空間的訊息時沒有被顯示 (`ValidatorDisplay.Dynamic`) 只適用於用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Static" name="Static" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_Static" name="Static" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified value is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的值不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidatorDisplay"></xref>值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether client-side validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: Use the EnableClientScript property to specify whether client-side validation is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 EnableClientScript 屬性來指定是否已啟用用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: Validation controls always perform validation on the server.
trans-unit.target: 驗證控制項一律會在伺服器上執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: They also have complete client-side implementation that allows DHTML-supported browsers (such as Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 and later) to perform validation on the client.
trans-unit.target: 他們也擁有完整的用戶端實作可讓 DHTML 支援瀏覽器 （例如 Microsoft Internet Explorer 4.0 和更新版本） 用戶端上執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: Client-side validation enhances the validation process by checking user input before it is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端驗證，以增強驗證程序傳送到伺服器之前，請檢查使用者輸入。

trans-unit.source: This allows errors to be detected on the client before the form is submitted, avoiding the round trip of information necessary for server-side validation.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓之前提交表單時，避免的伺服器端驗證所需的資訊，來回行程期間偵測到用戶端上的錯誤。

trans-unit.source: By default, this value is set to `true`, which enables client-side validation if the browser supports it.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，這個值設為`true`，可讓用戶端驗證，如果瀏覽器支援它。

trans-unit.source: You can disable client-side validation on a control-by-control basis.
trans-unit.target: 您可以停用控制項的控制項為基礎的用戶端驗證。

trans-unit.source: This is useful if dynamic updating on the client creates problems with the layout of the page, or if you want to execute some server code before validation takes place.
trans-unit.target: 如果用戶端上的動態更新會產生問題的頁面配置，或如果您想要進行驗證之前，執行某些伺服器程式碼，這非常有用。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if client-side validation is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用用戶端驗證。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the validation control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否已啟用驗證控制。

trans-unit.source: Use the Enabled property to specify whether the validation control is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 指定是否啟用驗證控制項中使用的 Enabled 屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can disable the validation control by setting this property to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 可以將此屬性設定為停用驗證控制項`false`。

trans-unit.source: Setting either the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the Enabled property to `false` will prevent validation from being performed.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或已啟用屬性`false`會防止執行驗證。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This causes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A> property to always evaluate to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這會導致<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>屬性一律評估為`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Enabled property is slightly different from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Enabled 屬性會稍有不同<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for a validation control is set to `true`, but the Enabled property is set to `false`, the validation control is still rendered for client-side validation, but in a disabled state.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>驗證控制項的屬性設定為`true`，但的 Enabled 屬性設定為`false`，驗證控制項仍轉譯用戶端驗證，但停用狀態。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Visible%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can then re-enable the validation control on the client by using DHTML script.
trans-unit.target: 您可以再重新啟用用戶端上的驗證控制項使用 DHTML 指令碼。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation control is enabled; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果已啟用驗證控制項。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text for the error message displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字中顯示錯誤訊息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref>控制當驗證失敗時。

trans-unit.source: When using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control, use the ErrorMessage property to specify the text to display in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control when validation fails for the current validation control.
trans-unit.target: 當使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控制，請使用 ErrorMessage 屬性來指定要顯示在文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控制當驗證失敗時的目前驗證控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text to display in the validation control itself, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要在驗證控制項本身所顯示的文字，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the ErrorMessage property without setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A> property, the value of the ErrorMessage property is also displayed in the validation control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您將 ErrorMessage 屬性未設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>屬性，ErrorMessage 屬性也會顯示在驗證控制項的值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 全球化和當地語系化](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The error message displayed in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 在顯示的錯誤訊息<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref>控制當驗證失敗時。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, this method contains the code to determine whether the value in the input control is valid.
trans-unit.target: 在衍生類別中覆寫，則這個方法會包含程式碼以判斷輸入控制項中的值是否有效。

trans-unit.source: Use the EvaluateIsValid method to determine whether the value in the input control specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property is valid.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷輸入控制項中的值指定是否使用 EvaluateIsValid 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>屬性才有效。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果輸入控制項中的值是否有效。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the message displayed when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定訊息驗證失敗時顯示的色彩。

trans-unit.source: Use the ForeColor property to specify a custom text color for the message displayed in the validation control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗時驗證控制項中顯示使用的前景色彩屬性，以指定訊息的自訂文字色彩。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the color of the message displayed when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref>表示訊息驗證失敗時顯示的色彩。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the client ID of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 取得指定之控制項的用戶端識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetControlRenderID method to get the client ID of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetControlRenderID 方法來取得指定之控制項的用戶端識別碼。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ClientID%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the control to get the client ID from.
trans-unit.target: 若要取得用戶端識別碼，從控制項的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The client ID of the specified control.
trans-unit.target: 指定控制項的用戶端識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Gets the value associated with the specified input control.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定之輸入控制項相關聯的值。

trans-unit.source: Use the GetControlValidationValue method to get the value associated with the specified input control, regardless of the control type.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 GetControlValidationValue 方法取得與指定之輸入控制項，不論控制項類型相關聯的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this method to get the value in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox> control, as well as the value of the selected item from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這個方法來取得值，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>控制項，以及從選取之項目的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox>

trans-unit.source: If the specified control cannot be found, `null` is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果找不到指定的控制項，`null`傳回。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The name of the input control to get the value from.
trans-unit.target: 要從中取得值的輸入控制項的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The value associated with the specified input control.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的輸入控制項相關聯的值。

trans-unit.source: Determines the validation property of a control (if it exists).
trans-unit.target: （如果有的話），請判斷控制項的驗證屬性。

trans-unit.source: The GetValidationProperty method is a helper function that gets the validation property of the specified input control.
trans-unit.target: GetValidationProperty 方法是 helper 函式可取得指定之輸入控制項的驗證屬性。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that represents the control to get the validation property of.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> ，代表要取得的驗證屬性的控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"></xref> that contains the validation property of the control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor"> </xref> ，包含控制項的驗證屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control generates unobtrusive JavaScript.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出控制項是否產生低調 JavaScript。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `false` if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UnobtrusiveValidationMode%2A> property value is <xref:System.Web.UI.UnobtrusiveValidationMode>; otherwise this property returns `true` .
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回`false`如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UnobtrusiveValidationMode%2A>屬性值是<xref:System.Web.UI.UnobtrusiveValidationMode>; 否則此屬性會傳回`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.UnobtrusiveValidationMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.UnobtrusiveValidationMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control generates unobtrusive JavaScript; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項產生低調 JavaScript。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the associated input control passes validation.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出相關聯輸入的控制項是否通過驗證。

trans-unit.source: Use the IsValid property to determine whether the associated input control passes validation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 IsValid 屬性以判斷相關聯輸入的控制項是否通過驗證。

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Because the default value of this property is `true`, it will return `true` if you query this property before validation is performed.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > 因為這個屬性的預設值是`true`，它會傳回`true`如果執行驗證之前，查詢此屬性。

trans-unit.source: For example, this might occur if you attempt to use this property in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName> event of a page.
trans-unit.target: 比方說，這可能是如果您嘗試使用這個屬性在<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName>頁面的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Load?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IsValid property is evaluated only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 會評估 IsValid 屬性時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A> method for each validation control on the page individually, or call all of them at once by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>方法來驗證每個頁面上個別控制項或使用一次呼叫它們全部<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.Validate%2A>

trans-unit.source: Button controls with their `CausesValidation` property set to `true` will also call the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 按鈕控制項使用其`CausesValidation`屬性設定為`true`也會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > It is possible to change the value of this property manually after validation has taken place.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 可以執行驗證之後，手動變更這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to override the validation result, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您覆寫驗證結果，如有必要。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property for the page is set to `true` only if the IsValid property for each validation control on the page is also set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>頁面屬性設定為`true`只有當頁面上的每個驗證控制項的 IsValid 屬性也設定為`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.IsValid%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the associated input control passes validation; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果相關聯輸入的控制項通過驗證。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: After this method calls the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method, it sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> property to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A> if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> property is not already set.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫基底控制項之後<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>方法，它會設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>屬性<xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A>如果下列條件成立:-<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A>未設定屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A> property indicates an ASP.NET version earlier than `4.0`.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>屬性表示的 ASP.NET 版本早於`4.0`。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, validator controls in ASP.NET 4 and later versions do not display errors in red.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET 4 和更新版本中的驗證程式控制項不會顯示錯誤以紅色。

trans-unit.source: For information about how to control the visual appearance of validator controls, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如何控制驗證程式控制項的視覺外觀的相關資訊，請參閱[驗證使用者輸入中的 ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method also registers the validation control on the page.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法也會註冊頁面上的驗證控制項。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.EventArgs?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the event data.

trans-unit.source: This method has been overridden to check the client browser and configure the validation control for compatibility prior to rendering.
trans-unit.target: 已覆寫這個方法來檢查用戶端瀏覽器並設定驗證控制項的呈現之前的相容性。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnPreRender method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnPreRender 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.target: 已取消註冊頁面上的驗證控制項覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: Use the PropertiesValid property to determine whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property contains a valid input control.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*> is a valid control; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>是有效的控制項，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>

trans-unit.source: Registers code on the page for client-side validation.
trans-unit.target: 註冊頁面上的用戶端驗證的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: Use the RegisterValidatorCommonScript method to register code on the page to perform client-side validation.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用 RegisterValidatorCommonScript 方法註冊在執行用戶端驗證 頁面上的程式碼。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Registers an ECMAScript array declaration using the array name <xref uid="langword_csharp_Page_Validators" name="Page_Validators" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 註冊 ECMAScript 陣列宣告，以使用陣列名稱<xref uid="langword_csharp_Page_Validators" name="Page_Validators" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Use the RegisterValidatorDeclaration method to register an ECMAScript array declaration using the array name `Page_Validators`.
trans-unit.target: 若要註冊 ECMAScript 陣列宣告，以使用陣列名稱使用 RegisterValidatorDeclaration 方法`Page_Validators`。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 主要由控制項開發人員使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Displays the control on the client.
trans-unit.target: 顯示用戶端上的控制項。

trans-unit.source: The Render method is used to generate the HTML markup for a validation control.
trans-unit.target: Render 方法用來產生驗證控制項的 HTML 標記。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，其中包含用戶端上呈現的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the client's browser supports "uplevel" rendering.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出用戶端瀏覽器是否支援"新版"呈現。

trans-unit.source: Use the RenderUplevel property to determine whether the client's browser supports "uplevel" rendering.
trans-unit.target: 若要判斷用戶端瀏覽器是否支援"新版"呈現使用 RenderUplevel 屬性。

trans-unit.source: For a browser to support "uplevel" rendering, it must support Microsoft Internet Explorer Document Object Model (DOM) version 4 or later and ECMAScript version 1.2 or later.
trans-unit.target: 支援 「 新版"轉譯的瀏覽器，它必須支援 4 或更新版本的 Microsoft Internet Explorer 文件物件模型 (DOM) 版本和 ECMAScript 版本 1.2 或更新版本。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the browser supports "uplevel" rendering; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果瀏覽器支援 「 新版"轉譯。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether focus is set to the control specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*> property when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出是否要將焦點設定為所指定的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>驗證失敗時的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>

trans-unit.source: Use the SetFocusOnError property to specify whether focus is automatically set to the control specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property when this validation control fails.
trans-unit.target: 使用 SetFocusOnError 屬性來指定是否焦點會自動設為所指定的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>屬性，這個驗證控制項失敗時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This allows the user to quickly update the appropriate control.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓使用者快速更新適當的控制項。

trans-unit.source: If multiple validation controls fail and this property is set to `true`, the control specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A> property for the first validation control receives focus.
trans-unit.target: 如果多個驗證控制項失敗，此屬性設定為`true`，在指定的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>屬性的第一個驗證控制項接收焦點。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to set focus on the control specified by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*> when validation fails; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>要設定所指定的控制項焦點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>當驗證失敗時; 否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ControlToValidate*>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定驗證失敗時，驗證控制項中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: Use the Text property to specify the text to display in a validation control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Text 屬性來指定要驗證失敗時，在驗證控制項中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: You can also display a summary of all controls that fail validation in the page by using a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以顯示在頁面中的驗證失敗所使用的所有控制項的摘要<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: To specify the text to display in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定要顯示在文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>控制，請使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If you set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property without setting the Text property, the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> property is also displayed in the validation control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果您設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>屬性未設定的值的文字屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>屬性也會顯示在驗證控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.ErrorMessage%2A>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the validation control when validation fails.
trans-unit.target: 驗證失敗時，驗證控制項中顯示的文字。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。

trans-unit.source: Performs validation on the associated input control and updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid*> property.
trans-unit.target: 相關聯輸入的控制項和更新執行驗證<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid*>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid*>

trans-unit.source: Use the Validate method to perform validation on the associated input control.
trans-unit.target: 使用相關聯輸入控制項上執行驗證的驗證方法。

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to programmatically perform validation on the input control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法可讓您以程式設計的方式輸入控制項上執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A> property is automatically updated with the validation results.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>屬性就會自動更新與驗證結果。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseValidator.IsValid%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個驗證控制項所屬的驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET provides many controls that have the ability to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 提供許多控制項已張貼至伺服器的能力。

trans-unit.source: When one of these controls has its `CausesValidation` property set to `true`, validation is performed when the control posts back to server.
trans-unit.target: 當其中一種控制項具有其`CausesValidation`屬性設定為`true`，控制項回傳至伺服器時執行驗證。

trans-unit.source: The following controls have the ability to post back to the server: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> > [!NOTE] > Some of these controls post back to the server only when the `AutoPostBack` property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 下列控制項有能力回傳至伺服器:- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName>- <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName>> [!NOTE] > 類控制項回傳至伺服器時，才`AutoPostBack`屬性設定為`true`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TextBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RadioButtonList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.LinkButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputImage?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlInputButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlControls.HtmlButton?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DropDownList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBoxList?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CheckBox?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BulletedList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: These controls each have a `ValidationGroup` property that, when set, validates only the validation controls within the specified group when the control triggers a post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 這些控制項都具有`ValidationGroup`屬性，設定時，控制觸發程序回傳至伺服器時，驗證只驗證控制項內指定的群組。

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to assign a validation control to a validation group.
trans-unit.target: 若要驗證群組指派驗證控制項使用 ValidationGroup 屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> class also exposes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetValidators%2A> method and a <xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A> method that accept a ValidationGroup input parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Page>類別也會公開<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetValidators%2A>方法和<xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A>接受 ValidationGroup 輸入的參數的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page.Validate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page.GetValidators%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 無法設定這個屬性的主題或樣式表主題。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The name of the validation group to which this validation control belongs.
trans-unit.target: 這個驗證控制項所屬的驗證群組名稱。

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string (""), which indicates that this property is not set.
trans-unit.target: 預設為空字串 ("")，表示這個屬性未設定。
